articles.description: Fletcher Magee had 21 points to lead five players in double figures and Wofford cruised to an 84-69 victory over Western Carolina on Thursday night.
articles.headline: Wofford rolls to 84-69 win over Western Carolina

articles.description: USC's Jordan McLaughlin finds Chimezie Metu inside to give the Trojans the winning bucket over the Ducks.
articles.headline: Trojans win on alley-oop

images.caption: USC's Jordan McLaughlin finds Chimezie Metu inside to give the Trojans the winning bucket over the Ducks.
images.name: Trojans win on alley-oop

articles.description: Corey Kispert led a balanced attack with 14 points and No. 9 Gonzaga beat Loyola Marymount 76-46 on Thursday night to retain at least a share of first place in the West Coast Conference.
articles.headline: Williams leads No. 9 Gonzaga over Loyola Marymount 76-46

articles.description: USC works the ball around to Elijah Stewart who nails the three to give the Trojans the lead over the Ducks.
articles.headline: USC's Stewart knocks down clutch 3-pointer

images.caption: USC works the ball around to Elijah Stewart who nails the three to give the Trojans the lead over the Ducks.
images.name: USC's Stewart knocks down clutch 3-pointer

articles.description: Nahziah Carter flies through the paint and a teammate for a huge throw down.
articles.headline: Carter leaps over teammate for putback dunk

articles.description: Josh Ajayi had 26 points to go with 14 rebounds to help South Alabama continue its domination of Appalachian State with a 77-66 win over the Mountaineers in Sun Belt Conference action on Thursday night.
articles.headline: Ajayi has 26 points, 14 boards as South Alabama wins 77-66
